content:
Anyone know how to set keybinds? I'm stuck on this screen:
image.png

http://www.jedit.org/users-guide/global-opts.html#shortcuts-pane
This site says to click on the table, but for me nothing happens when I do this.

I assume that you already found it, but for the record (and for future people who find this topic): you have to double-click on the the "primary shortcut" column. This opens a modal window where you can enter a new shortcut
